# elizaos/eliza Daily Update (Jan 9, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
Today's development focused on enhancing the `plugin-sql` package with Neon serverless support and improved RLS security, alongside critical bug fixes for backend hot reloading and PGLite compatibility.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

### SQL Plugin Enhancements & Security
The `plugin-sql` package received significant updates, including the addition of Neon serverless database support and improvements to Row-Level Security (RLS). This enhances the plugin's capabilities and strengthens data isolation. ([#6343](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6343))

### Backend Development Workflow Improvements
A comprehensive hot reload functionality was implemented for backend development, automatically rebuilding the CLI and restarting the server upon TypeScript file modifications in watched packages. This streamlines the development process. ([#6293](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6293))

### Database Compatibility and Testing
Bug fixes addressed issues with `pgcrypto` extension installation for PGLite, eliminating unnecessary warning logs. Additionally, RLS tests were improved by utilizing `withEntityContext()` and enabling data isolation in CI, ensuring robust testing. ([#6339](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6339), [#6330](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6330))

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
- [#6351](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6351) V2.0.0: This PR likely introduces a new major version of the project.
- [#6349](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6349) chore: Optimize build task inputs in turbo.json: This PR aims to optimize the build process by refining task inputs in the `turbo.json` configuration.

## CLOSED ISSUES
No issues were closed today.

## NEW ISSUES
### User Experience and Interface Improvements
Several issues were opened to address user experience and interface elements. These include removing the '+' from personality traits and topics of interest fields for better UX ([#6350](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6350)), and improving the display and hover functionality of public/private icons in the dashboard ([#6352](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6352)).

### Onboarding and Navigation Flow
New issues highlight areas for improving the user onboarding and navigation experience. This includes making "Sign up for free" a hyperlink in agent messages for non-signed-up users ([#6353](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6353)), and ensuring that logging in or signing up redirects users back to their previous agent chat session instead of the dashboard ([#6354](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/6354)).

## ACTIVE ISSUES
No active issues with more than 3 comments.
